content:
I have cloned the natural number's game repo with the hopes of having it be the base of a personal project.

Has anyone had any luck getting it up and running on their own local machine??

The docs mention that compile.sh, run_locally.sh, ship.sh won't work since they have dependencies which are local to whoever created this.

Nevermind, I found this repository which seems to better fit my use case

https://github.com/mpedramfar/Lean-game-maker
Lucas Teixeira has marked this topic as resolved.
